channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Spotify says Wrapped 2025 is its biggest yet, with 200M+ users in its first day
item.description: After last year's flop, Spotify Wrapped engagement is up 19% and shares were up 41%, the company says.

item.title: Nexus isn’t going all-in on AI, keeping half of its new $700M fund for India startups
item.description: Nexus Venture Partners manages $3.2 billion in capital across its funds and has invested in more than 130 companies over the years.

item.title: A Startup Says It Has Found a Hidden Source of Geothermal Energy
item.description: Zanskar uses AI to identify hidden geothermal systems—and claims it has found one that could fuel a power plant, the first such discovery by industry ...

item.title: AI finds its way into Apple’s top apps of the year
item.description: Although Apple has continued to avoid naming a dedicated AI app or AI chatbot as its app of the year, AI was showcased among this year's winners.

item.title: EU investigating Meta over policy change that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
item.description: The European Commission is is launching an antitrust investigation into Meta's move to ban other AI companies from using WhatsApp's business tools to ...

item.title: The 19 Best Golf Gifts for Every Kind of Golfer (2025)
item.description: Make your favorite golfer’s day with the best golf gifts to enhance every part of their game.

item.title: Anthropic signs $200M deal to bring its LLMs to Snowflake’s customers
item.description: AI research lab Anthropic inked a $200 million deal with Snowflake to bring its AI models to Snowflake's 12,600 customers.

item.title: Antigravity A1 Review: A 360-Degree Drone
item.description: The Antigravity A1 is fun all around, if you don’t mind the steep price or wearing goggles to control it.

item.title: InnAIO AI Translator T10 Review: Feature-Loaded but Needs Work
item.description: The InnAIO T10 clips magnetically to the back of your phone, but it needs further development to be worth the money.

item.title: The Best Meteor Shower of the Year Is Coming—Here’s How to Watch
item.description: The highlight of the year, the Geminids are the most active and colorful meteor shower, offering the chance to see hundreds of shooting stars every ho...
